title: React-Portfolio
description: React Portfolio is a personal portfolio website that showcases projects, skills, and contact information. It is built using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: PWA: Text Editor
description: PWAs are web applications that are regular web pages or websites, but can appear to the user like traditional applications or native mobile applications.

title: Socialmedia
description: Socialmedia is a social media application that allows users to post, like, and comment on posts. It is built using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Regex-Tutorial
description: Regex-Tutorial is a tutorial that explains how to use regular expressions to match patterns in text. It is built using Git and Markdown.

title: Take-my-notes
description: Take-my-notes is a note-taking application that allows users to create, edit, and delete notes. It is built using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Svg-Generator
description: Svg-Generator is a web application that allows users to create and download SVG images. It is built using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
